description: Situated within the Clitunno hotel, this well-managed family-run restaurant serves classic, seasonal meat and fish dishes, including generous portions of black truffles in some dishes. Recently refurbished, the intimate, elegant dining room also occasionally features live music at weekends, while the outdoor terrace on the small square offers pleasant alfresco dining. Guests are advised to park outside the ZTL (restricted traffic zone) and make their way on foot, via a short walk through the beautiful historic centre.
